description: This is an API project a Criterpedia of all Animal Crossing creatures
This webpage is a number-guessing game, where users win a star each time they correctly guess a number.
This project is a duplica of the classic Mario game where users control Mario using 'A' and 'D' to move around and 'space' to jump.
This webpage generates blocks for users to make their own pixel art.
This is my first personal website built using only HTML and CSS.
This habit-tracking application includes a calendar, a habit manager and a dashboard offering statistics about users' habits forming condition.
